title.native: 賢者の弟子を名乗る賢者
title.romaji: Kenja no Deshi wo Nanoru Kenja
title.english: She Professed Herself Pupil of the Wise Man

description:
Kagami Sakimori plays as the great mage Danblf in his favorite MMO. He falls asleep after a night of testing new character appearances, but instead of waking up to a suspended game, he’s inside of Arch Earth Online—as a girl! Now named Mira, he must convince the game’s people that Mira is a pupil of Danblf, who vanished without a trace 30 years ago…and figure out how he got here.

(Source: Funimation)
synonyms: ฉันเป็นศิษย์จอมปราชญ์จริงๆ นะ
Petapa Sihir yang Mengaku sebagai Murid Petapa Sihir

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Virtual World
tags.description: Partly or completely set in the world inside a video game.

tags.name: Gender Bending
tags.description: Prominently features a character who dresses and behaves in a way characteristic of another gender, or has been transformed into a person of another gender.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

node.description:
[Website](http://www.fuzichoco.com) | [Blog](http://fuzichoko.blog39.fc2.com) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/fuzichoco) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/fuzichoco) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/member.php?id=27517)

Began her professional career as early as highschool. Has an uncommon sense of colour depth among modern Japanese illustrators. Her work already expanded outside illustration for anime, manga and novels. She draws for outdoor campaigns, museums, and even was featured in TV shows as well. 
She now resides in Tokyo, Japan.

name.native: スコット・マクドナルド

node.description: Active since: February 17, 2016 [Website](http://leido.co.jp/erabareshi) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/_erabareshi_) | [Anison](http://anison.info/data/person/39824.html) | [Wiki](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E3%82%A8%E3%83%A9%E3%83%90%E3%83%AC%E3%82%B7) An eight-member idol group that originated in Akihabara. (Source: MAL)

__[Website](http://asaka1007.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/asakaofficial)__

__Birthplace:__ Aichi Prefecture, Japan
__Hobbies & Special Skills:__ Watching Anime, Karaoke, Cosplay, Sleeping, English

__Asaka__ is a Japanese vocalist and translator.

__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/chiyomaru5pb)__ | __[Company Profile (MAGES)](http://mages.co.jp/about/company/)__

__Chiyomaru Shikura__ is a Japanese guitarist, novelist, voice actor, radio personality, moderator, animation planner, animation supervisor, music producer, composer, arranger and the representative director of 5pb./MAGES. 

Chiyomaru resigns as chairman and representative director of MAGES. on January 4th, 2023.

He has been the producer and lead animation planner for titles such as Chaos;Head, Steins;Gate, and Robotics;Notes. Shikura is also a very active composer and lyricist. To date, he has written over a hundred theme songs for the video games and anime adaptations he's worked on.

Adam Zehner is the vice president of acquisitions and licensing at Funimation. He was born in Perrysburg, a city in Ohio, USA. In 1999, he graduated from The University of Texas at Austin. 

(Source: AniDB)
